content.rendered:
Together we can change the world

Mobilizing Youth For Change

We know it is the power of youth that can change the world and benefit every generation. No matter what you have, know that there is always something to share. Come and join our youth-led movement to bring about change and make an impact on millions of lives!

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

Together we can change the world

Participate in global mobilization of youth for the global goals

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

sustainable development goals for a better future

The Sustainable Development Goals are a collection of 17 global goals designed to be a “blueprint to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all”, set in 2015 by the United Nations General Assembly and intended to be achieved by the year 2030. The motto of the goals is “Leave No One Behind” and the role of the youth in achieving these goals are mandatory for success, to ensure the planet a common, bright, and sustainable future.

What We Do

01.

We Campaign

Raising awareness about the SDGs and social issues is a key factor in our strive towards bringing about positive social action

02.

We Mentor

We provide quality mentoring relationships to harness powerful positive effects on youth by helping them unleash their true potential.

05.

We Share

We create a collaborative environment of sharing our expertise and nurtured connections to allow community members an opportunity for success in life.

04.

We Partner

We scale impacts to create a ripple effect of positive outcomes for young people, adults, agencies and communities.

06.

We Mobilize

We encourage our community members to take on responsibilities to effect positive social change in their own communities.

03.

We Train

Skills training enables youth to take positive action to create changes in their lives and their communities.

Get Involve

Join Us for the Global Goals

Rising Youth Foundation is giving you the opportunity to take positive social action with an agenda to mobilize the youth, engage them in our current ongoing projects and help them integrate and understand the development landscape.



Experience

  • Internship
  • Partnership
  • Share Your Story
  • Campus Ambassador
  • Country Ambassador
GET INVOLVE

Be a Part Of

Our Mission

At the center of everything we do, we believe in equal opportunity for all. Yet millions are left behind. With a combined agenda to mobilize the youth on a global scale as well as “Leave No Man Behind”, RYF strives to bring innovative solutions and projects to stimulate youth action and create a world that is sustainable for the generations to come.

Quality Education

Global Peace

Fake News

Digital Literacy

Gender Inquality

1200 +

Countries

Know More About

What We Achieved

14256+ Students equipped with substantial knowledge over SDGs and opportunities in the development sector to date. 105+ Workshops equipped thousands of youth with the skills to explore and bring positive changes in the community. 42510+ mentoring hours provided the youth with the best of practices to unleash their true potential.We reached 27+ countries benefiting youth from diverse demography through our projects.

Facebook
Twitter
Youtube
Instagram

World's Largest Lesson

World’s Largest Lesson brings the Global Goals to children all over the world and unites them in taking action. Since our launch in September 2015, we have reached over 130 countries and impacted over 8 million children each year.
